    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_SHOW_VIEWSHED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SHOW_VIEWSHED
        Action to show the viewshed overlay. The Intent should include one of the extras:
        • EXTRA_ELEV_THRESHOLD
        • EXTRA_ELEV_POINT
        In the event that more than one is included, the threshold elevation argument will be selected using the above order.

        This action may be posted after the viewshed is made visible to update the viewshed elevation threshold value.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_ELEV_POINT

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_ELEV_POINT
        The point of interest for viewshed analysis. The associated value should be an GeoPoint instance. If the associated point does not have a valid altitude, the elevation model will be queried.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        See Also:

      • VIEWSHED_UID

        public static final java.lang.String VIEWSHED_UID
        The UID of the MapItem of interest for viewshed analysis. The associated value should be an instance of String that is the MapItem UID. If the GeoPoint associated with the MapItem does not have a valid altitude, the elevation model will be queried at the point.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_ELEV_THRESHOLD

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_ELEV_THRESHOLD
        The elevation threshold value for the viewshed, in meters MSL. A value of Double.NaN indicates an invalid value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
